greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Inverse permutation to A072634.
link: Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
program: (Scheme functions below show the essential idea. For a complete source, follow the "Gatomorphisms" link.)
(define (unrank-bintree rank pr1 pr2) (cond ((zero? rank) (list)) (else (cons (unrank-bintree (pr1 (-1+ rank)) pr1 pr2) (unrank-bintree (pr2 (-1+ rank)) pr1 pr2)))))
xref: A072644 gives the size of the corresponding parenthesizations, i.e. A072644(n) = A029837(A014486(A072635(n))+1)/2 [A029837(n+1) gives the binary width of n].
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Jun 02 2002
